name: Developer DAO
description: Developer DAO exists to accelerate the education and impact of a new wave of web3 builders. This journey is an indication of the proposed $CODE token distribution. Subject to change!

tasks.name: Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your journey into the Developer DAO.

tasks.name: Hold the Devs for Revolution NFT
tasks.description: Every member will receive 400 tokens for holding the NFT at the time of the snapshot.

tasks.name: Pre-season 0 POAP or pre-season 0 snapshot vote
tasks.description: If a member holds a POAP from our Developer DAO town halls before Season 0 OR voted on either of our first two snapshot proposals, they will receive an additional 359* tokens.
